items.title: ktranish/hook: A lightweight HTTP client built on the Fetch API, designed for flexibility, configurability, lifecycle logging, and analytics.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: This project is a lightweight, customizable weather widget built using React. It provides real-time weather updates for any location and showcases a responsive, clean, and user-friendly interface. Ideal for embedding in websites or personal projects.
items.title: AnkitKumar2023-27/Weather-widget: This project is a lightweight, customizable weather widget built using React. It provides real-time weather updates for any location and showcases a responsive, clean, and user-friendly interface. Ideal for embedding in websites or personal projects.
